content: Proyecto de Cultivo Conjunto de Postgraduados de Universidad de Nankai- Universidad de Glasgow Nankai University-University of Glasgow Joint Graduate School is win-win cooperation between Nankai University and the University of Glasgow.The Joint Graduate School began enrolling full-time postgraduates in 2015. There are four majors being provided in the program including international relations (030207H), regional economics (urban and regional planning) (020202H), environment management, and economic (environmental management)(0830z1H), and English language and literature (050201H).
